Name: Winter Sleigh
About the game: It is the weekend and Timmy with his sister and dad are having fun in the snowy hills. Pick your sleigh and join them! There are many tracks to try, some easier, some more challenging. Can you complete them all? Winter Sleigh is a beautiful snow-slide simulation game for those who miss the excitement one usually gets when sliding down snowy hills. Features: Epic levels for you and your sleigh; Play as a guy dressed as the Santa Claus; Amazing snow experience; A built-in level creator for more exciting levels for you to make and share with your friends; Reindeers. Important! No reindeers were harmed during the creation of this game.
